mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOTTERY_ORDER( ID, LOTTERY_ID, ISSUE_CODE, USER_ID, MULTIPLE, BET_NUMBER, ORDER_TIME, RESULT ) VALUES( #{id}, #{lotteryId}, #{issueCode}, #{userId}, #{multiple}, #{betNumber}, #{orderTime}, #{result} )
INSERT INTO DRAW_RESULT( ID, LOTTERY_ID, ISSUE_CODE, DRAW_RESULT, SALE_TIME, OPEN_DRAW_TIME ) VALUES( #{id}, #{lotteryId}, #{issueCode}, #{drawResult}, #{saleTime}, #{openDrawTime} )
